skills.Name: Two-handed Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 4.5 and Accuracy by 3 when using a two-handed sword or a two-handed blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 4.2 and Evasion by 3 when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 3.3 when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: Boost HP
skills.Description: Increases Max HP by 60.

skills.Name: Power Bash
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy with 185 Power added to P. Atk. Requires a sword or blunt weapon. Adds 1 stack of Momentum.

skills.Name: Fatal Strike
skills.Description: Swing your weapon with power only the strong can do, dealing 380 Physical Damage. Requires a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Heavy Crush
skills.Description: Slams down with your weapon to deal 30 Physical Damage and stun the target for 5 seconds. Requires a 2h Weapon. Ignores Shield Defense. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Crystallize
skills.Description: Makes D-grade Crystallization possible.

skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 4.5 and Accuracy by 3 when using a two-handed sword or a two-handed blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Fast HP Recovery
skills.Description: Increases HP Recovery Bonus by 1.1.

skills.Name: Power Bash
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy with 220 Power added to P. Atk. Requires a sword or blunt weapon. Over-hit.

skills.Name: Fatal Strike
skills.Description: Swing your weapon with power only the strong can do, dealing 380 Physical Damage. Requires a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Heavy Crush
skills.Description: Slams down with your weapon to deal 40 Physical Damage and stun the target for 5 seconds. Requires a 2h Weapon. Ignores Shield Defense. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Enrage
skills.Description: You won't give up, becoming enraged. Heal 10% of total HP..

skills.Name: Crush of Doom
skills.Description: Swing your weapon back to hurl it with all your weight against the target. crippling the target. Deal 500 Physical Damage and slow the target for 8 seconds. Requires a sword or blunt weapon to be equipped and 2 stacks of Momentum.

skills.Name: Force Mastery
skills.Description: Absorbs the target's Momentum. Momentum can be absorbed with a 15% chance for regular physical attacks and 30% during a critical attack. Applies when a fist weapon is equipped. Up to stage 1 of Momentum can be absorbed.

skills.Name: Summon Mechanic Golem
